website_summaries.verdict: High-end features include a waterproof backup camera, enhanced night vision, and Sony Starvis Sensor.
pros: Dual cameras with UHD video resolution up to 2560 x 1440P
Anti-glare touchscreen is responsive and easy to navigate
Camera makes adjustments and enhancements to improve visibility in low-light conditions
Comes with parking assistance and has emergency recording capabilities
cons: Somewhat limited viewing angle during livestream, and the screen brightness can be distracting

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Front and Rear Camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent Product! I replaced my two old dash cams with this and never looked back. This supports upto 128GB while my old ones only supports upto 32GB. I used the rear mirror camera view almost all the time. When turned off, the standard mirror has somewhat anti-glare coating which reduces bright lights. I uploaded a video on how easy to use the UI and some sample recordings for both front and rear camera.
customer_reviews.author: Lowell08

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and excellent built quality
customer_reviews.text: This product is awesome. this is a lightweight, easy to use dashcam that delivers great results. Build quality is impressive. It has everything I need. Very easy installation and set up. It comes with everything you need . I would recommend to anyone. Simple set up, easy to use! I , the quality of the video and the sound clarity are unsurpassed! . I would highly recommend this dash cam for anybody looking for a quality setup When pointed into the cabin, the image and colors look fantastic. Pointed outdoors, looks great. At night, looks really good - not grainy at all...was very surprised at nighttime.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed Murshid Mohamed Mukthar

customer_reviews.title: Failed
customer_reviews.text: Complete waste of money. Just today I got my car messed up because of construction. And that dang thing didn't even record it. The record light is blinking. Wth. I got stuff on there from December what?? Why? Ridiculous.. when I needed it the most it wasn't there for me. Hence this is why I bought the thing. Feel ripped off.. Go figure though right.. if something is going to go wrong it will go wrong when you don't need it to go wrong the most.. story of my life.. "Don't cry for me Argentina" bla...
customer_reviews.author: Gh

customer_reviews.title: unreliable
customer_reviews.text: had this for a month the thing won't shut off or respond to the touch screen left it over night it re started next day now 2 months later it won't shut off and the screen is black and says entering parking mode
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Keeps restarting by itself
customer_reviews.text: Piece of junk restarts by itself even before getting a chance to see how clear the camera really is. Also, I have an Acura TSX. The mirror does not even cover my rear view mirror.
customer_reviews.author: A. S.

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: This covers your rear view mirror. It automatically switches to back up camera when you go in reverse. Useless if you actually already have a back up camera. I bought this because I wanted to have the recording behind my car while driving not because I needed that feature. Also it wants you I to use screws to set up the back camera and I am not about putting holes in my new car. Returned it. Return was fast and easy.
customer_reviews.author: Tonya W

customer_reviews.title: poor quality but corrected the issue
customer_reviews.text: The first unit i received kept telling me my sd card need to be formatted and my sd card was too slow, Id re format and a few minutes later same error. I sent it back and the replacement worked good, after 5 days the rear camera started showing rainbow lines. I am sending the second back and will try another brand. Update 3-20 contacted support and they advised to reset to defaults and it cured the issue, we shall see how long this one lasts, very questionable. Customer service has been great and they took care of the issue promptly, it is working fine and I cant say enough how good they treated me.
customer_reviews.author: Bob W

customer_reviews.title: EDIT: L̵a̵s̵t̵e̵d̵ ̵T̵w̵o̵ ̵D̵a̵y̵s̵  Customer Service Helped Me
customer_reviews.text: I'm editing my review. After my initial issues, customer service at VanTop reached out to me in a big way and fixed everything for me quickly at new cost. The replacement dash cam is working perfectly. Fantastic resolution, easy to use and install, and discreet in design. I was just unfortunate enough to have received a defective device, but VanTop certainly exceeded expectations in fixing it. Special thanks to Anne.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Double image and glare in rearview mirror
customer_reviews.text: I bought this unit primarily for the backup camera. That feature does work (although I would have preferred a better looking camera that doesn't look like the box provided). The main problem is that the rearview mirror produces a double image that makes it difficult to see clearly. I also reflects a glare from car headlights behind you. The company seems to be aware of the poor design but offers no solution. They did offer me a refund but then I am stuck with the installation costs. I do not recommend this product. Also downgraded the rating when the manufacturer offered me $100 to give them more stars!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not remove the sticker on the backup camera!
customer_reviews.text: Great product, installation can be difficult depending on your car, may need to buy some extension wiring and crimps. As for the backup camera, the night vision leaves something to be desired, I have ceramic tint on all my windows and it was blocking too much IR light. I then moved the camera to the outside of my car and mounted it and on a sunny day the camera would almost white out. At night headlights would cause it to flare. This is where that sticker covering the camera comes in. I thought it was a standard sticker that protects the lens during shipping but nope, it's a CPL filter. DO NOT REMOVE IT UNTIL YOU FIRST TEST IT OUT!!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Farragut

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Support
customer_reviews.text: When it worked, it was fantastic. Rear view and front view cameras were pretty clear. But about after a month it would glitch out (go into menu and out by itself). After a month and a half it would intermittently turn on and off which was frustrating. Now it is permanently dead as far as I can tell.. Edit: I've changed my previous 1 star rating to a 5 star. The company reached out immediately and sent out another working mirror within a few days. Customer support responded quick. Thank you
customer_reviews.author: Mihael

customer_reviews.title: I can see again!
customer_reviews.text: Got the camera installed in a 144 sprinter van and loving it as we don't have any rear windows. The camera wire was long enough to reach the end of the van. We got it running up through the console and through the headliner to the back. (Dangling power wire in pic is temporary). We have an existing backup camera but wanted this full time rear view camera. We were able to mount the camera on the existing housing (as shown in the picture). Haven't used the actual camera too much yet but loving my first days with it. Only thing I noticed is swiping up and down could be more responsive but I won't be using that much.
customer_reviews.author: D. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't show the full frame by default and terrible night vision.
customer_reviews.text: Poor vision at night, especially with headlights. I bought these to fight off glare, but the lens on this camera produces scattered light as much as my cataracts. I bought two of these and may be returning them both. Also, the default view isn't fully zoomed out so you're missing a large portion of the picture. Only when you do split view between the front and back do you get the full, full frame view.
customer_reviews.author: JS

customer_reviews.title: dead
customer_reviews.text: arrived non functonal. contacted VanTop with support request will update if they respond or if I return.
customer_reviews.author: Josh Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Screen too dim / double image in "mirror"
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to like this car dash, but sadly the "mirror" when the screen is powered off, provides a tinted dimmed double image ( dues tonparallax effect) of what you would normally see in a mirror. OK so then if you have the screen on always and use the rear camera for your rear view, the screen ( even turned to max brightness) is too dim during daylight hours, and the result is another double image: one from the screen and one from the mirror reflection
customer_reviews.author: Dmh529

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product at a great price. Easy to install (didn't need to tap into wire bc I already have a factory installed back up camera, wanted this for recording), customer service responded in less than 24 hours (high sensitivity for park/driving mode was too sensitive so it was lock recording to where I couldn't use the touch screen but once I set it to low, it works perfectly), it's unobtrusive and looks sharp. So many compliments on it so far. Plan on giving as presents to family! My kid also likes being able to see everything - it's like watching a show for her.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hands down best dash cam on the market.
customer_reviews.text: 1.) Great quality cam for the cost... 2.) Doesn't overheat like other brands 3.) Comes with rear camera with reverse system. 4.) Doesn't freeze up. 5.) Fits nearly perfect around original mirror for discreet appearance. 6.) Acts as regular mirror when you press the bottom button once. 7.) Has rear and front playback features with a decent size screen to view it on. -1 point for not having a voice action ai system prompting with a phone Bluetooth mic and speaker combo even if they would wanna charge an extra $50 on top of price I would definitely pay for that feature for safety reasons and driver safety. 💪😎
customer_reviews.author: Ryan😬

customer_reviews.title: Great Camera. Exactly what we needed for off roading or on the street.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this camera for a car my kids and I are working on during Covid. We have had it on during off-road trips as well as on the street. It works just great. Placed an SD card into the camera and followed the instructions provided for wiring and we were set. Quality is just amazing. When we are going to take a steep trail or similar we press the lock button to get some good footage saved. On the way home from a recent trip we were almost hit on the freeway and had it recorded both front and back. Invaluable. Great Camera. Great instructions. Kit had everything I needed. Well worth the price!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Huber

customer_reviews.title: Failed after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I liked this camera initially, but it failed after 6 months and 1 week. Of course, the product support only last 6 months. I'm trying to figure out how to claim a warranty or just good-customer-service repair, as the screen still boots up but darkens to maybe ~10% brightness almost immediately after startup. May not seem like a big deal, but it causes you to not be able to see the video image, but only a mixed of reflected mirror images from the mirror itself - extremely dangerous as my eyes try to figure out what to focus on as I'm backing up. Will revise the review if VanTop steps up and offers some support.
customer_reviews.author: Justin A.

customer_reviews.title: Best Dash Cam we've purchased.
customer_reviews.text: We have a couple of other dash cam and by far this has the best image and video quality. This is strictly a dash cam, it does not have any media playback just what you capture. Lots of features and settings to play around with. I was afraid that when it's parked will drain our van battery but it seems its fine. We have a RAV4 and didn't need to purchase an extension. We just ran it threw the side molding and diretly to the rear window. We decided not to put it outside just in case someone desides to pull it off. Happy with my purchase and thinking of purchasing another, just waiting for it to go on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Blinkit Photography

customer_reviews.title: Touch screen not working
customer_reviews.text: Touch screen not working, ordered a replacement. let's see if it works
customer_reviews.author: FM

customer_reviews.title: reasonable price, good product with some issues
customer_reviews.text: 1) easy installation, concept is good, picture quality is good 2) issue: red wire isn't long enough, i have to extend it to reach parking light 3) backing guide is just something shows up on the screen, it doesn't do anything for you (not like backup assistance you see from original cars 4) rear camera installation is tricky and faulty. In order for me to get straight guide in my screen i have to install is 15 degrees angle off from the center line. The lens was not aligned well. 5) I really wanted to return but the problem was you have to undo all the wiring in the car, i just wanted seller to swap me the rear camera.
customer_reviews.author: Duke

customer_reviews.title: Great value and High Definition  Touch Screen
customer_reviews.text: I have had the Vantop Mirror Dash Cam installed on my 2016 GMC Sierra for 3 months now. The included camera cable was long enough to install the camera on the license plate and run the wire along the passengar side frame and up through an OEM grommet hole of the rear cab, from there I ran the wire along the floor trim up the pillar and to the rearview mirror camera. The video quality of the camera is superb, the rear camera doesnt perform too well at night mainly due to other vehicles headlights but the front camera works perfect in day and night. I am looking to purchase this for my other vehicle very soon.
customer_reviews.author: Wardo

customer_reviews.title: Now I don't worry about running over my neighbors kids.
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased a mustang, love the car but you can't see what's behind you. There is a problem with predicting what an how it will display as it want's to record or give a view where you can't see the bottom half of the view backing up. Update: The plug that goes into the 12vdc connector has a 5 volt regulator in it and if your car is parked a couple of days it will run down your battery. I have ordered some fuse connectors for the spare ACC fuses (Nilight Fuse Holder Add-a-circuit Fuse TAP Adapter Mini ATM APM Blade Fuse Holder-10 Pack). Until I get the connectors I will continue to unplug the 12 vdc connector.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Dare

customer_reviews.title: Good value for money with some issues
customer_reviews.text: Having been using this dash cam for about a week. Running cables from the backup camera to the front and to the reverse light is easier than I thought. The video quality is good even in low light situation. The interface is responsive and easy to use. However, it is not perfect. Headlights wash out the image at night. It could be quite annoying if you put the rear view on the screen at night. In a sunny day, sometimes the screen is difficult to see because of the glare. It is ok for me because I mainly use it as a backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Best dash cam out there..
customer_reviews.text: I had originally bought the 609 model, but needed the extra 5ft that comes with newer model for rear camera. Everything looks great, front and rear, and I like the menu / settings on this newer model as well. The only problem I have had, is using the feature to show different camera angles by swiping down, seems to be a problem when you want to go back to full view where touchscreen is unresponsive. Could be firmware problem. You also get the reverse guideline once you hook up red wire to reverse light. One other thing to note, this item makes the rear view mirror top heavy, and the mirror doesn’t stay in a fixed position anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Photostar

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dashcam
customer_reviews.text: Great dashcam, great video quality and easy to install. Never had a dashcam before but my 2017 Hyundai Elantra SE had no back up camera and this was the perfect answer, plus the security of having record of any accidents is obviously a great benefit. It records front and rear cameras at the same time, has parking mode so any dinks whilst parked are recorded too. lots of options in the setting menu, to many to list here.Easy to navigate touch screen, turn off the screen and you have your rear view mirror back with the journey being recorded in the background, one touch of the screen and its back again.............love it. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: jimboriley

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect
customer_reviews.text: I was originally looking for just a backup camera function *something*. So I purchased this VanTop Mirror Dash Cam without really looking at the details. Only when I installed it did I realize that it so much more than just a back up camera. Its a streaming video, touch screen monitor. And its nearly perfect. My only complaint is about the rear camera: it works much better with ambient light. It still works for night time environments but it works better with other things in the background areas. Other than that Its awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Edward

customer_reviews.title: Best dash and rear camera on the market
customer_reviews.text: I have serval dash cams and sport cams for my jeep to recording off road trips but this is the first for my street vehicle, mainly to record "she said he said". Both the front and rear cameras our clear and sharp ( just one thing if you our using the rear cam for a mirror vehicle our closer then they appear in the mirror). You cant go wrong with this mirror cam best on the market for the price and you get a rear camera. Most others only front cam not both front and rear you would pay about the same for the rear cam. I recommend this dash and rear camera to anyone and I have. DWG
customer_reviews.author: DWG

customer_reviews.title: Awesome mirror with amazing quality. Perfect for my side by side
customer_reviews.text: This mirror does everything and more than I even care about. The video image is amazing and works great. I put this on my side by side so I could see out of the back. The mirror itself is not waterproof but it’s easy to remove. It got wet and muddy so it appears to be water resistant. The actually rear camera is defiantly waterproof. The forward facing cam is great. It’s adjustable left to right, for my situation I wish it could go up and down but beggars can not be choosers. It really is a awesome reverse cam. You can apparently play music and all kinds of stuff from it. Best bang for the buck.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: OK im impressed... this thing worked better then expected... its awesome
customer_reviews.text: it straps on in line 2 seconds.. one wire hook up and bam its working... Took a little work to install the rear camera, I had to purchase a "4 pin camera extension to reach the rear of my crew cab service truck but man it really works great... I really like it... Its nice having a rear view mirror again, having a service truck you get used to staring at an air compressor in your rear view... so actually seeing what is coming up behind you is awesome ... Love the controls .. its just about perfect.. I am impressed... I really don't have any suggestions to improve it..
customer_reviews.author: CMA Major Rocketman

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable price and quality!
customer_reviews.text: I installed this for a Sprinter based RV. I previously had a rear view mirror but since there is no rear window it was completely useless. This installed in a few hours and is wonderful. I did use an extension cable to mount the rear camera just above my license plate. I've had it a couple months now and every time I drive I can't believe what a difference it makes. The continuous recording is a nice extra. Can't figure out how they can make this stuff so innovative and inexpensive. For anybody with an RV this is especially useful.
customer_reviews.author: Tampa Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great setup with a few issues
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to replace a similar product. Installation was easy since I was able to use the same wiring from before. Both front and rear camera views are clear but the rear view seems to need an adjustment. The image appears closer than actual and isn’t great if you’re trying to get really close. I have adjusted the camera to see my bumper but then you can’t see what’s behind you in the distance. Also, the mirror does vibrate while driving. My last one did the same, but what do you expect for a product like this. Regardless, I’m happy with the purchase and for the price you get a great setup.
customer_reviews.author: Blair Stefanescu

customer_reviews.title: Works great as intended. Sharp, crystal clear screen. 2k recording is great.
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product compare to the one I had before is a lot better and it also has a lot of functions, for example you can choose front or rear or both views at the same time on the display just with one touch.Installation is also pretty straightforward with the manual.It took me around 5 hours in my Opel Astra wagon (better run the cable from the rear camera to the mirror under the roof liner in a straight line because running under the side trims the wire is not enough to cover the distance in a long wagon car. Overall very satisfied and I am sure it will be also very reliable.
customer_reviews.author: Mowmita roy

customer_reviews.title: Temperature Restriction of 160°f
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product, which was a little upsetting because it really was the best cam I could find especially for the price. Unfortunately the manual specified that it should not be left in temperatures exceeding 160°f. I live in the desert and the interior of my car reaches +160°f easily. I dont believe this is specified in the item description, so I hope this information helps.
customer_reviews.author: Spiff

customer_reviews.title: Work great 👍
customer_reviews.text: Very good investment for my 2009 Toyota Sienna minivan, I was in need of a backup camera and I decided on this because of its good comments and they are actually real because after I installed it, I just had to connect it to the car outlet and it worked very well right away, I had to buy an extra extension cable to place the rear camera because the original is short, so whoever has a truck, suv, minivan or other long cars will have to buy an extension, they can be found on Amazon, I have been with the camera and pole now I have no problems and I live in Florida where it is very hot
customer_reviews.author: Lazaro Yumar

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: The dashcam is really easy to install, the rear camera is also very easy. I ran the wires so they aren’t seen and the install looks clean. I’ve had it installed for about a week and I have nothing bad to say about it so far. The touch screen is responsive, the picture is crisp and clear (license plates on other vehicles are a good reference) the rear camera gives added comfort and the fact it doubles as a backup camera if you want is also very cool. Overall I like the product a lot, it looks good in the car and the video quality is better than expected. I would 100% recommend this to anyone looking for a dashcam.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathon Capaul

customer_reviews.title: Cool gadget BUT
customer_reviews.text: The front camera quality is good. One day the screen froze and the power button stopped working. So I disconnected the camera with the power outlet until the internal battery died it was frozen with the last image on the screen. The backup camera doesn't cover much view vertically. It's no were close to the backup camera installed in cars. It wierd to drive using back camera as your rear view. You cannot see a car 50 feet behind you at all. Its good to record video. It makes sounds when it turns on and the day your car is getting robbed this will be the first thing to go. Overall cool gadget BUT not practical.
customer_reviews.author: Raman

customer_reviews.title: Confident This Is The Best Deal On Amazon
customer_reviews.text: SOMETHING I DON'T SEE MENTIONED A LOT: Rain will very negatively impact the quality of the camera, especially at night. This is not a product flaw; it's just what happens when you have a camera exposed to rain/water. Not a deal breaker, however. Absolutely amazing camera! Night visibility is insane; I can make out the lines on old country roads at night (where there are no street lights)! There is little to no delay in between what is happening behind you and when you see it on the screen. Very fast device. Response time is great.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Had few different cameras in last few years some was cheap and some was expensive and no one had angle and resolution as this one,godd picture even though night drive. It's great to see bot cameras at same time, the wire for rear camera is long enough to go from back of 20ft shuttle bus to front, you can conect rear camera to reverse light and there is you backup camera with distance lines. Only one thing that may make this camera better if it have optical zoom ,not just digital . Bottom line -great camera,so far this is the one that must have.
customer_reviews.author: KK

customer_reviews.title: Nice dashcam/mirror
customer_reviews.text: My car did not come with a rear view camera, so i bought a similar product about 6 yrs ago. It was good, but i wanted a bigger screen and better resolution, so I bought this one. First impressions, looks very nice. relatively easy to install, but it will take you 30 min to 1 hr, depending on how experience you are installing gadgets on your car and how accessible your car is to run cables. Not too fond of the touch screen feature, it leaves the mirror very dirty and i find myself using the button more often. Not too many complaints here. Overall, good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Adan Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent video quality all day long!
customer_reviews.text: We use this on a commercial van (Ford Transit 350) to help us keep an eye on our drivers and boy did we nailed it with this one. Video quality on sunny days is incredible well balanced; it has a license plate enhancement feature that works like a charm for those vehicles that drive to close to you up-front and back. We usually don`t drive at night time, but I could see everything clearly when testing in dark alleys and streets. Everything you could possibly need comes in the package. All in all, this is all we could ask for on a double dash cam.
customer_reviews.author: A. Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Great addition to Jeep for better visibility
customer_reviews.text: I added this to my daughters Jeep which improved the visibility tremendously. The night view is better than I expected with a wide view and clearer than a typical rearview mirror... Almost lightens it up more to see better. Installation was easy, especially in Jeep. Only two things is that I end up shutting the camera off and using the mirror on sunny days with top down as the glare from sun makes it difficult to see. I also find it annoying how the split screen shows up by default when you start the car, which requires you to change to rearview only before you start driving. I'm hoping a firmware update in the near future will fix
customer_reviews.author: Chuck Heinle

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Quality Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: At first I did not ever hear about Vantop as a dash cam. So I gave this this company a shot. Setup was perfectly easy even installing the rear camera. the quality is fantastic. install a Micro SD Card was needed. recording is easy and does save to the card. The only issue I have is the rear camera for night time its hard to see but then again if you are getting hit from behind as long as the other person that follows you have their lights on should be perfectly fine. This is an awesome camera and I don't have any regrets and neither will you
customer_reviews.author: Alucard

customer_reviews.title: This camera is just as important as putting on your seatbelt.
customer_reviews.text: I love this camera. It's got front and rear cameras and great views both night and day. It is a godsend, especially when backing up in parking lots, shopping malls and out of congested parking spaces. My anxiety level goes away down as soon as I turn on my Van Top H610 mirror dash cam. You will be very happy to have the camera running when you get out there in traffic with some crazy drivers. You will know that everything is being recorded in case of an accident. This is the best camera I have ever owned for my car.
customer_reviews.author: Finola

customer_reviews.title: Super for the cost
customer_reviews.text: Advanced touchscreen mirror for the price. It's light, feels well built, and had great resolution. Amazing at this price. I put it on a Can Am X3 and it makes backing up easy now. I had to hardwire it (bought separate kit for that) and added a reserse light switch. If you're handy with writing, this is a breeze to hardwire. If your not, then you're stuck with the lighter power adaptor. Wish it was easier to determine which hardwire kit works with this unit. I sort of took a best guess and it worked fine.
customer_reviews.author: Wiley Coyote

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Dash Cams That I've Owned
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dash cam several months ago and feel it is now time to leave an honest review. I have and have had others, and I must say that this is one of the best that I've owned. The menu is easy to navigate and the touch screen function works exactly as it should. The clarity of the video and photos are second to none. I also like the fact the night time viewing is the actual color that you see with your eyes and not that infra red look. I'd highly recommend this dash cam, if you are looking for a quality product that is a top performer.
customer_reviews.author: LDear2360

customer_reviews.title: Works with polarized sunglasses. Needs more mounting options! great user interface
customer_reviews.text: This mirror has a great camera and display. The screen is bright and has a quick response time. The screen is visible with polarized sunglasses as well which is important for me! It turns on quickly as well. I was going to buy a stereo with a screen on it until I saw that the boot time was about 13 seconds! Not very useful for a backup cam! I'm knocked a star off because it doesn't have an oem look as far as mounting goes and because the reverse guide lines are fairly useless. I wound up removing the rear pads and found that there are metric M2 threads underneath and I was able to fabricate my own mount.
customer_reviews.author: Jalalila

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 Recommend
customer_reviews.text: After several months of using it still works perfectly 10/10 I recommend The wires plug into the top I stuffed them into my headliner and down the trim of my door I have an excursion and the wire was plenty long to reach the back of my SUV I love this camera so much I bought another for my car I feel safe knowing that the front and behind are being recorded so that I have proof of anything that happens And having all the tools I need at my fingertips Thank you van top For making a camera I actually love Iv Ben looking a long time for a good reliable camera and have Ben thru dozens
customer_reviews.author: Tim G or Charli B

customer_reviews.title: Great product for backing up.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this product and the quality. It gives me peace of mind. Since I didnt feel comfortable installing it myself, I had a car mechanic install it for me and drill a hole in the back of my trunk for the wires. The mechanic said he was planning to order one himself after seeing how it worked. It is great and super high tech. Since it was installed on the outside of my car to match the lines on the backup video screen, when it rains the back camera becomes blurry because of the water droplets. I can still see outline of cars but that is about it.
customer_reviews.author: Mochi

customer_reviews.title: Affordable dash cam and active rear view camera.  High Quality and Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product for the money. The front and rear cameras function perfectly. It is extremely easy to setup and use. After purchasing the camera, I was involved in a situation on the road which almost claimed my life. But with luck and the excellent video footage of the incident, the police were able to use that video to find and make a case against the perpetrators in this situation. In my opinion, it has already paid for itself multiple times over. I initially purchased this because the wing blocks much of my rear visibility which it does an excellent job handling with the full active rear view all the time. Overall a great product.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff P

customer_reviews.title: Rear view greatly improved
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the mirror dash cam as a gift for my husband. He has a GMC Sierra with a camper shell and was complaining about not being able to see behind the vehicle when backing up and changing lanes. Now he says he can easily see vehicle behind him when using the new mirror. He uses his truck for hunting and has to tuck the side mirrors in when traveling off road. He has had a tough time backing his vehicle up without the help of the side mirrors. He is looking forward to trying out the camera on his next hunt.
customer_reviews.author: JLReno

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again in a heartbeat
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy I got this dash camera. I opened an Amazon Charge account and got a substantial discount on the price. I took it to a professional to have it installed. The instruction booklet is a little hard to follow but with practice I got used to it. It's well-designed and user friendly. I love that it will record someone hitting my car while it's parked. I'm glad I bought it. Be sure to order the wire kit for $12.99; I didn't, and it caused my car battery to go dead after my car sat a few days.
customer_reviews.author: Renniebaby

customer_reviews.title: Huge difference to rear visibility
customer_reviews.text: Jeep Wrangler provides poor rear mirror visibility; none when fully packed. Quality of the camera and the screen are excellent. Recording feature is on but haven't spent time reviewing video. Although I gave it five stars, two things would make it even better. A slightly longer camera cord (from the camera). The connector to the main line is exposed to the elements as the cord was too short to run inside. The second item is a more OEM style mount (instead of the rubber-bands) as an option. At least one other model provides this mounting option in addition to the rubber-bands
customer_reviews.author: Tom Becht

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING, but needs a MINOR TWEAKS
customer_reviews.text: The front & rear cameras are darn near 4k quality. Touch screen is very responsive & the audio is very clear. Cons: -Back up lines do not come up when putting my car in reverse, causing me to overcompensate when parking. It makes me unable to judge how close or far I am from another vehicle when parking. -Mirror should come with an app to download recordings instead of having to take out the memory card Other than that, this product is amazing & I would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Manny M.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for when you need to see past a topper or camper!
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, easy to install. Very good customer service! My camera bracket broke shortly after install and they sent us another one quickly. I have a topper for my F250 with a RTT installed... there’s no way I could see behind me before. I use this as an always on rear view mirror and now I have 0 blind spots. Only thing I could say bad about it is the camera needs light to work well. If you’re in a dark road with no one else, it’s not super useful, but for the price point I really can’t complain.
customer_reviews.author: ReadySetGOrdon

customer_reviews.title: Impressive System Overall - Big Trucks & SUV's Need More Wire Length Than Included
customer_reviews.text: Great set up. Responsive screen with awesome features. Very high quality video from the front and rear. Only complaint is that the wiring was not long enough for my Toyota 4Runner and that the camera power is from a cig lighter outlet. I bought a wiring kit to have the camera on all the time (hooked into the fuse box.)
customer_reviews.author: RT

customer_reviews.title: Great daily dash camera
customer_reviews.text: After searching forever for the perfect dash cam this would be it. Camera quality is perfect day/night clear images clear videos and easy to use. I’ve recommended it a few times already to others who has seen it. It automatically records when it feels like you’ve been hit by another car since I live in ny most potholes definitely makes the camera lock the videos on the lowest settings which is fine by me. The cameras adjusts perfectly to how you want it either by the way you angle it or just adjustments on the screen. I did get it on sale for $80 but I’d still pay $99.99 for it any day cause it’s worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Satesh Motiram

customer_reviews.title: Great alternative for cars with no back-up camera
customer_reviews.text: The installation seemed a little daunting when we read the directions, but it wasn't nearly as bad as we thought. It will take a couple hours, and it is much easier with two people. The camera is crystal clear. The ability to have a split screen is a great feature. The straps provided can get a little soft in hotter temperature areas (we are in AZ) so I would recommend getting some command strips or velcro to attach the mirror. The touchscreen is very responsive, and I haven't had any issues. Great product! I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dragon fan

customer_reviews.title: The best dashcam and rearview cam I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I used to have a front dashcam only but wanted to upgrade to have a back camera too. Both the cameras deliver amazing video output, I mostly use the rearview feed as it helps spot a blind spot vehicle with it's wide angle lens. Tip: do not mount the camera inside the car, put it on the trunk for a best view and quality of the video. I put it on Streaming mode to continously have rearview. There are other brands in the market but Vantop is definitely a YES YES as it delivers high quality video and camera gear.
customer_reviews.author: Uvais

customer_reviews.title: Great must have for cars
customer_reviews.text: I have the new version of the camera, but this video is from the older one, I was rear ended by someone on their phone and this was the proof I needed to get my car replaced because it was totaled out. This is great for a backup camera as well and the night vision is great. Having the peace of mind that this device is watching front and back is amazing. It also has a parking feature so if someone dinks your car while it’s parked it will start recording. All I can say is this is a great dash cam because you get the front and the back, highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This camera is Amazing!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing!!! I get so many complements on it everyone that sees it wants it! I was off-roading last week and it was so helpful when backing up on the trail..... the cameras are so clear and the video play back is awesome....... Everyone should have one of these for your own safety..... my parents got rear ended and the cop said it was there word against the other driver’s word... if they would have had this camera they could have shown the truth and would have saved them a lot of $$$$$$ Get one!!!! Best one out there!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Great option for older cars
customer_reviews.text: I like how easy this was to install, I did not have to remove or modify my existing mirror and it fits perfectly. The image quality is great! I was also worried about night time driving but the camera works just fine in the dark. I can see even more than with just a regular mirror. The rearview camera seems to be holding up to the Arizona 115 degree heat just fine. I highly recommend this mirror cam for older cars without backup cameras. Plus the parking mode is nice to see if anyone is messing with your car while you're away. Great price too.
customer_reviews.author: t sosa

customer_reviews.title: Must buy great p
customer_reviews.text: The mirror dash cam and rear view mirror is a life saver. I have a 2013 Honda Accord coupe and it was hard to back up into parking spots but with this is easy and fun. The mirror shows you blind spots when your driving that help you become a more aware driver. Installment was easy if your having any Doubts about purchasing this product don’t because it is well worth it. A must buy if you have problems backing up or blind spots in your car. Also the safety of the recording front and back is a plus can Literally help you if you ever get into a car accident.
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Finnally a real full screen rearview mirror with dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: The screen looks and works great! The only option I wish was available for this mirror is a factory replacement kit. Depending on which car I have it in it does not cover the entire mirror on the right and the camera slides out and protrudes on the left. A mounting kit to physically replace the OEM mirror would be a top line bonus!
customer_reviews.author: Brent Hermansen

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Dash Cam
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dash CAM in June 2020 for my Ford Escape. The installation is pretty easy. The rear camera wiring is more than sufficient (was concerned that some reviews said it was a bit short. I installed the rear cam in side the rear window (of course I designed and glued a mounting feature by myself). Since then, I am very happy with the quality for both front and rear during night and day. The black area shape is a bit unique shape for Ford Escape 2018. Highly recommended !
customer_reviews.author: H. Wijaya

customer_reviews.title: Good tool. Make sure your mirror is on the thicker side
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice camera. I am overall happy with it. Minor issues I experienced are associated with the fact that the mounting is not solid enough and the mirror mounted piece trembles when the car is in motion. This gives me a bit of nausea. I was unable to stop that from happening. This, however may very well be only my case. With rearview camera definitely needs to be installed by a professional, it is not for an unexpected person to do. But once in, it is a fantastic tool.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High speed Micro SD card, I mean not old one.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased many dash cams but the mirror-mount dash cams are the best choice. They never fall down while you are driving in results of heat expose or vibrations. Also the mirror-mount dash cam will not block part of your driving views. It’s very helpful for the night time driving because is tinted in nature and kills rear cars’ approaching lights. This product is working really good. It records both front and rear events and save them in two separate folders in micro SD card. Just remember you will need a high speed micro- SD card; otherwise it won’t record video.
customer_reviews.author: GreenEnergy

customer_reviews.title: This thing is fantastic
customer_reviews.text: The front camera is amazing, day and night. The rear camera is about average, but with a really wide angle. With a VW Golf you get a wide enough perspective from the rear camera mounted top center inside the back window to see both blind spots! My only really hit probably could be fixed with a firmware update, when you put the car in reverse, the parking assist is intermittent. The resolution of the camera changes every time, so the signal is consistent, but the parking indicators are sometimes there and sometimes not. Not a big deal because you can still see everything without hitting anything.
customer_reviews.author: Soderlund

customer_reviews.title: A great addition to my truck
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to use as a rear view mirror because the canopy on my truck has a very dark rear window. The install was very easy and the system works well. It takes a little getting used to as the rear view is a moving picture and subject to some frame rate stutter, however I can see what is behind me now. There is a bit of distortion due to the wide angle lens, things are actually closer than they appear in the screen. I can live with that. It fits my needs.
customer_reviews.author: MichaelGD

customer_reviews.title: A good one to by
customer_reviews.text: So far it is the camera and reverse camera. The picture on both look great. I don't have the reverse camera hooked up to the reverse light. Not any fault to the camera. So I will write more later. I do reccomend it for people to buy it. I did a lot of research and this is the one I picked
customer_reviews.author: dana c.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality Mirror Dash Cam, executes all features very well
customer_reviews.text: Did my research and found out VanTop H610 to be one of the best Mirror Dash cams. It works well, executes all features. I installed it on a 2019 Rav 4. Did not need to install the dash cam to the brake light, because one of the modes keeps the back cam as the standard. The only hard thing was to move the camera mount, it is quite stiff to position. 2 modes of video (standard and locked), multiple features to change the movement, loop recording. Great Product, happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Wazi

customer_reviews.title: It's cool
customer_reviews.text: Helps having this in my 95 Trooper. I loæike the parking mode a lot. Although I am running into an issue. Sometimes when I start the car it either doesn't turn on or it stays in lock mode. I usually just unplug the back camera and plug it back in and then I'm good to go. No big deal, annoying, but I can manage. 3 stars because the glare from passing cars overpowers the screen a ton, and because the thing freezes at start up often. But, great screen quality as far as dash and go
customer_reviews.author: Josh Irwin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This rearview dash cam..is very much worth the purchase..easy install.easy wiring for rear view backup cam...fits on my rearview mirror great and I have a ram 1500. Camera quality is amazing front and back..I have left this thing plugged in for days without problems...wish the rearview camera lines curved while reversing but hey..you can’t get everything ...The controls or touchscreen easy to use..settings are easy to understand..Anyone who gets in my truck is amazed by it..I have even heard the picture quality shows better than some phones..it has everything you need ..snap pictures , record drives and the sound ..really surprised by the recording..
customer_reviews.author: Leslie

customer_reviews.title: Unbelievable customer service
customer_reviews.text: *Update* I posted the below review not expecting anything as I was outside the 1 month return policy. I was happy with the product, it just suddenly stopped working and I clearly should have contacted the company first. They sent me a replacement with no questions asked entirely unsolicited. I would overall give the camera 4 stars but customer service like this is 5 stars! Worked great for the first month. After 6 weeks of regular use the screen died. The device will no longer turn on and I doubt it's even recording anymore. I'm two weeks outside their return window. I would not recommend the product to anyone. I'm very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Brown

customer_reviews.title: Not a good dash cam
customer_reviews.text: pdate: after 2 months of used from 4 to 1 star. The camares switch ramdomly from the rear view to the front view and to the recorded videos. I have reset, disconnect the cables and nothing seems to fix this issue, it just happens randomly. Is a really good dash cam, but it could be better. Easy to install, great touch screen sensibility. I just wish that you can turn off the recording every-time you start the car and keep the cam off unless you put it on reverse. (but not a big deal).
customer_reviews.author: Fernando

customer_reviews.title: This Cam is the last one you will buy
customer_reviews.text: I have had three dash cams of this stile. VanTop H610 is the last one and the best of all of them. The image quality is very good. In settings, the large amount of option at your finger tip, personalizes this item to the best of your needs. Next time you see something out the ordinary on the road, don't worry, ppl will believe you because in on video. The 10 inch mirror might sound too large. It is not its perfect. I have recommended this item to several people.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: must buy
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 3 of them already and i DO NOT REGRET IT !!!! the quality of this product is high! ypu wont need to spend so much money this is Literally a plug and play if you want just the front camera .. if you want the back camera then u have to find a spotnto place it but its Soooo easy !!! Its a must buy ... parking mode is awesome too especially if you go shopping like at Walmart and some people put the cart so close to ur car .. it will record!!! any movement really its truly so worth it !!!
customer_reviews.author: Dgkgurl

customer_reviews.title: Purchase this with no hesitation!
customer_reviews.text: Probably one of the most amazing cameras I’ve ever installed. For the longest I didn’t even know that there was a yellow film on the lens. The resolution was amazing even before I removed that lens film. I would highly highly highly recommend this camera to anyone and since then I’ve had my vehicle worked on and the tow truck driver and every other person who has gotten into my vehicle complements me on that camera.
customer_reviews.author: yourdata

customer_reviews.title: Great product, and service!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this camera/rear view set-up for my large converted Sprinter van. I ran the included extension cable for the rear camera, and it was just a few feet too short. I contacted VanTop customer service and they were able to set me up with a longer cable. Now i finally have visibility when backing up int this long van! This product is jam packed with features that help with security, video documentation, and external visibility in front and behind the vehicle. Great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Atom

customer_reviews.title: impresive vision
customer_reviews.text: i am own a chevy pick up with a closed cap at the back due this i have no vision of the obstacles locate at the middle the only help are the outside mirror with the camera from van top i am in control of my back i can see if somebody are walking while i am in reverse can see if a tree or a pole are in my back out of my mirror the camera was easy to install and cover the lenght of the truck by the way my truck are a long bed truck turn on at the touch the night view is excellent ,
customer_reviews.author: Pedro C.

customer_reviews.title: Best of the six I tried
customer_reviews.text: I ended up ordering six different dash cam mirrors. of all of them, this is the keeper. it has the best display hands down. others would flicker or show resolution lines. the hardware is solid on this model. I have a truck and do off road. a couple of the models would restart under heavy bouncing or vibration. this has the clearest screen, best navigation, among the best night vision, accepts 128g memory card and rock solid hardware. . this was every feature I wanted and this was the only model to deliver. i highly recommend and will update if I run into any problems.
customer_reviews.author: cafeplaya

customer_reviews.title: These are best Dashcam at this price point.
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing bad I can say about this Dash cam. It's simple great. I didn't know it could capture such high quality video. Im glad I got this. Only thing is you have mess with the settings or the loops of video will be like 5 mins each only. Also make sure that accident shake motion recording off or it will start new video every time you go over a bump. I kept it turned off because the camera runs regardless while driving. I love it. Installing was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Zoro

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic customer support
customer_reviews.text: Pretty decent product. The camera quality is pretty good, dusk has fantastic quality, but night vision isn't that great. Headlights obscure your sight significantly. When you go into reverse, the camera changes to a weird warped perspective, shifts down and there is no way to change it. Other than that, the product works pretty well. Adding to my review: the company has done an outstanding job to keep their customers satisfied. When they heard of my issues, they contacted me directly and did everything to make it right. After providing them with photos of the issues, they offered me solutions to improve my situation at no cost to me. Spectacular customer support.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Great product that needs improvement in some areas
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1) Great camera, especially at night 2) Wide angle view 3) Doesn't look cheap at all 4) Installation is easy Cons: 1) You cannot adjust the rearview lines. It's too narrow for the width of my car so I need to overcompensate when backing up. 2) The only power cable provided was the one that connects to a 12V outlet in your car. I wish they gave us a cable that could connect to the car's electrical system.
customer_reviews.author: RiverVisual

customer_reviews.title: Great dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: It's been the best dash camera I've owned! It's definitely worth the money! The only drawback being that the display panel makes it a little more difficult to see when the digital display is off. The mirror's reflection is a little dark and makes it hard to see when using it. But a simple fix is to just turn off the sleep mode and use the camera as the rearview mirror luckily. Other than that the dash cam has great! The user interface is easy to use and it's been a reliable camera for the few months I've had it!
customer_reviews.author: Ryan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good camera but the guidance lines on screen during backup are not useful
customer_reviews.text: The unit comes with a cable for the rear camera which wa only 18 feet long. Since I was installing on a pickup truck that wasn't long enough. The manufacturer of this unit does not offer a longer one. However I did locate one on Amazon sold by DYMCO-US which is 29.5 feet long and has the correct 4-pin connector. The touch screen works fine and does the backup camera. However the Guidance Lines on screen for assistance with backing up are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Chris P.

customer_reviews.title: Good dash cam for a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is decent quality. Touch screen works well. Rear camera mount would be nice to have different mounting options. An adapter to change the mount height for vehicles that have rear window defroster. Back up camera was easy to hook into the positive side of the reverse wires and is responsive when you put the vehicle in reverse. I would recommend that product. I would buy a Obd power cable for it with the angled usb for easier wiring. (Also hides the power cable easier.)
customer_reviews.author: Shawn G

customer_reviews.title: A great quality mirror dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: After testing out the product below are some of my findings: PROs: -Daytime video recording is responsive and of good quality. -Touch screen is helpful in accessing various functions, also adjusting view on mirror - actual recorded view is larger. -Can act as a clear mirror if screen is set to OFF. -Night vision is able to brighten darker areas for better viewing. CONs: -Night vision: some of the colors such as green or red traffic lights are a bit dulled out compared to what our eyes see, but it is not critical. -Length of cam barely covers the mirror, wish it was a bit longer. Highly recommend this, for a product at this price range it is excellent!!
customer_reviews.author: ACS

customer_reviews.title: Affordable Dash Cam with Rear-Facing Camera
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the VanTop H610 for my vehicle since I didn't have a backup camera installed. I've been using the H610 for awhile now and the security features make it a good price. I like the fact that it has both a front and rear camera option. I essentially purchased a dash cam security camera and a backup camera all-in-one! Not to mention that it looks very sleek. I would recommend the H610 to anyone in need of an affordable dash/backup camera.
customer_reviews.author: Diet Coke Fiend

customer_reviews.title: Amazing dash cam!
customer_reviews.text: Don't hesitate to buy this product! During the day, the cameras (both front and back) look great as well as at night time. This camera has made it a ton easier for me to reverse into tight spots that I otherwise wouldn't attempt without the camera installed in the back of my car. The camera comes with different settings for motion detection which automatically records and locks in the videos incase of any un-intentional road accidents.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua

customer_reviews.title: Meh, it's okay, there is worse options for more money and better options for less.
customer_reviews.text: It's not the worst unit, and I can attest that months later it is still working. My gripe is its not very user friendly, the touchscreen is old tech that causes difficulty to select desired item. Video play back on a computer or TV using the memory the van top recorded on is okay... It's not the best quality, but similar to a smartphone camera in 2014... Also, the unit gets kinda hot, but it's still working so it's not a complaint just an observation.
customer_reviews.author: Snaps on Petro

customer_reviews.title: Simply perfect
customer_reviews.text: So after almost 3 months of use this dash cam is just perfect. Blends in with the car very well, small an very aesthetically pleasing. Camera quality is great, and if you also install the rear camera it’s amazing. I leave my rear camera on all the time, and don’t use the actual rear view mirror, instead I use that camera as it gives you a wider angle when looking behind the car. Has a built in parking monitor option which is why I got this dash cam, and it works flawless. If someone hits your car while parked the camera will turn on and record for about 30 seconds. Definitely recommend, great product.
customer_reviews.author: Luka

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, practical, great quality...
customer_reviews.text: This was such a surprise for me, in the sense of the high quality for low price, it sure is an inexpensive product but its not by any means cheap quality. It was very easy to install especially with the very convenient dash tool, the wires are easy to conceal and are long enough that i could take the back camera all the way to the license plate on my long bed, double cab tacoma, and there was still slack. The image from the camera is crisp and it works as it should without any hiccups. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: The camera is a quality buy! Installation took about an hour, hooked up to my reverse lights and now I have a back up cam with guidelines. My car is tinted so I always keep the reverse camera on and its better than looking through my original rear view mirror. I even think i might be able to lower my insurance because I'm recording my driving now. Simple to install, easy to use, quality buy. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dash cam. Everything I needed in a dash cam at an affordable price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this dash cam. Installation was straight forward and not difficult at all. I opted for hardwire kit which was well worth the extra cost. I had an issue with rear camera that stopped working shortly after Amazon return date. Contacted supplier and their STELLAR customer service promptly shipped me a new rear camera and rear camera power supply cord which fixed my problems. They kept in contact with me via email to make sure that all issues where solved. Excellent customer service!!! I would definitely recommend this seller and their products to anyone looking for a quality made products that are backed by a seller that stands behind their products.
customer_reviews.author: David E

customer_reviews.title: YOU DON'T WANT THIS
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't believe how many people rated this device so highly, but then I got a promotional coupon (related to the purchase of this purchase) - that may be the reason for the inflation. In short, don't ever buy a dash cam that slips over the rearview mirror. The objects in the mirror will vibrate and there will always be conflict between the camara image and the reflected image (yes it will still reflect like a normal mirror). This especially problematic at night - you will have double vision.
customer_reviews.author: SHADE TREE LEVY

customer_reviews.title: best dashcam i ever owned
customer_reviews.text: the picture quality for both cameras is excellent both day and night vision, when the screen is off (but still recording) it looks like a regular mirror. easy to use and understand touchscreen menu. very long power cord. i have mine plugged into the rear seat console. the motion detect feature works great, i finally caught who has been taking my Sunday newspaper off my driveway!, no kidding and no more cam stuck to the windshield witch in my state can be a obstruction of view ticket. I am buying a second one for my wife's car now. great camera at a great price
customer_reviews.author: ron

customer_reviews.title: Cable not long enough
customer_reviews.text: I like the front camera the resolution is very clear, the rear is not as clear. The cable that comes to connect the rear camera was not long enough to be properly route to reach the back of my 2 door f450. The touchscreen is not that sensitive. The back up sensors are not that accurate since I had to installed the camera on the side and not in the senter back of the vehicle. A bit over price too. The rear camera doesn't really work like a rear view mirror It is super bright and hard to see what's behind the car when you are moving.
customer_reviews.author: ROCIO RAMIREZ

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: This a great 2.5k cam system. It was easy to install. The menu is well laid out. The screen is very large, taking up the whole screen and is very nice. It has the ability to change view angles by moving your fingers up and down on the left side of the screen and changing screen brightness by moving the fingers up and down on the right side of the screen. I only had two issues with this camera: 1) The cable brake light wire is too short. I had to extend it. 2) During very Sunny weather, glare appears on the rear camera. Overall, This is a great cam that I highly recommend to all.
customer_reviews.author: Djecks

product_meta.title: VanTop H610 10" 2.5K Mirror Dash Cam for Cars with Full Touch Screen, Waterproof Backup Camera Rear View Mirror Camera, Enhanced Night Vision with Sony Starvis Sensor, Parking Assistance
feature_bullets: 【2.5K Dual Cams with Wide FOV】 Dual cams provide with Ultra HD video resolution up to 2560 x 1440P (2.5K). Offer you much clearer footage capturing license plates from a distance. 170° adjustable front lens and 160° rear lens cover total 330° field of view to reduce blind area and capture more scenes on the road.

【Enhanced Starlight Night Vision】 Equipped with advanced Sony "Starvis" sensor, the dash cam captures sharp videos with enhanced details at extreme low light conditions. Make it a trustworthy guardian for your car all day and night.

【Backup Camera with Parking Assistance】 Backup camera shows rear view of the car by displaying high-resolution video streaming in the rear-view mirror. When the car is put into reverse, the screen image will display park assist lines for safe and easy parking.

【Loop Recording/G-sensor/Parking Monitor】 Loop Recording allows continuous recording even if the memory card reaches full capacity; G-sensor detects a sudden collision and locks the collision footage; Parking monitor functions as a surveillance camera system while the vehicle is off.

【Responsive 10" IPS Touch Screen】 10'' IPS anti-glare touch screen with 2.5d Glass, features better color reproduction, displays the real-time traffic on road with no lag. User-friendly interface is easy to operate with fast responsiveness.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,465 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
